summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lawvek premium B2B SaaS website for investor presentation. All required features implemented successfully with professional design quality.
passed_tests: Hero section with 'Contract review, intelligently priced' headline
Social proof badge 'Trusted by 500+ legal teams'
Stats section ($2.4M saved, 2hrs turnaround, 60% cost reduction)
Trust strip with 'Featured in' and all 5 publications
Approach section with 3 cards and emerald hover effects
How It Works section with numbered steps 01-05
Benefits section with 6 cards and hover effects
Testimonial section with Sarah Chen quote and stats
CTA section with gradient background and dual buttons
Footer with Product, Company, Legal columns and social links
Header scroll effect (background changes on scroll)
Mobile responsive navigation with working toggle menu
Professional design quality for investor presentation
